scripts.test-headless-chrome: testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:width=1500;height=900 --no-default-browser-check --lang=en-US --disable-plugins --disable-infobars" -r spec,xunit:test_results/report.xml -c 3 -S -s screenshots_of_fails --video videos_of_fails --video-options failedOnly=true tests/*
scripts.test-headless-firefox: testcafe "firefox:headless --window-size=1500x900" -r spec,xunit:test_results/report.xml -c 3 -S -s screenshots_of_fails --video videos_of_fails --video-options failedOnly=true tests/*
